Technical difficulties or poor audio quality, which can make the podcast sound unprofessional or difficult to listen to.
Difficulty in establishing a consistent release schedule, which can lead to missed episodes or inconsistent content.
Struggling to build a loyal listener base, which can make it difficult to grow the podcast and reach a wider audience.
Difficulty in finding and securing high-quality guests or interviewees, which can make the podcast less engaging or valuable to listeners.
Pressure to create content that is both informative and entertaining, which can be challenging and may lead to burnout or creative block.
